about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: In a world driven by technology, we believe every young generation deserves the opportunity to learn, create, and share.
about.paragraph1: <1>Coding Academy</1> is a learning community in the field of information technology focused on web development, UI/UX design, and other relevant IT skills. We connect students, mentors, and alumni in a project-based learning ecosystem that is fun, professional, and adaptive to the needs of the digital industry.
about.paragraph2: This community grows with the spirit of <1>Learn, Create, Share</1> â€” learning with curiosity, creating meaningful works, and sharing them so that more people can benefit. With a professional and adaptive approach, <1>Coding Academy</1> serves as a bridge to prepare young generations for the ever-evolving demands of the digital industry.

Build a supportive learning community among students, mentors, and alumni.
Develop students` potential through fun, creative, and innovative approaches.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Coding Academy.

questions.q: What is the duration of the Web Development Bootcamp?
questions.a: The bootcamp lasts for 12 weeks, with a mix of live sessions, project work, and mentorship.

questions.q: Do I need prior coding experience to join?
questions.a: No prior experience is required. Our program is designed for beginners and will take you from basics to advanced topics.
Yes, upon successful completion of the program, you will receive a certificate of completion.

questions.q: What kind of support will I receive during the program?
questions.a: You will have access to mentors, peer support groups, and regular Q&A sessions to help you throughout your learning journey.

questions.q: Can I join the program if I am located outside the country?
questions.a: Yes, our online components allow students from anywhere in the world to participate.

questions.q: What is the cost of the program?
questions.a: Please contact us directly for the most up-to-date pricing information and any available scholarships or payment plans.
